name: Until The Break of Dawn
description:
Controls:
- Left mouse button to move to the cursor.
- Right mouse button to drop items

This game is our submission to the BlackThornProd gamejam 3. It is out second participation in a jam.

As the game we have created is somewhat of an experience, we do not want to spoil anything in a description. The game is 5 minutes at most, so we would be pleased if you would spend a couple of them in this world we have made:)

Credit to my partner:)
https://zeroject.itch.io/
